casebody.data:
Thornton D. ROBERTS, Plaintiff in Error, v. Frank B. LOWN, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 4, 1926.) No. 196. E. A. Bates, of New York City,-for plaintiff in error. Abram J. Ross, of New York City, for defendant in error.

' Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges,

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
